title: Kraken Warns Users: Your Bitcoin Trading Data Is Headed to the IRS
description: Kraken sent an email to customers on Wednesday to let them know it plans to share data on crypto trades of more than $20,000 by November.

title: AI’s environmental impact under scrutiny
description: A recent executive briefing by GlobalData has shed light on pivotal concerns surrounding the regulation and environmental implications of Artificial Intelligence (AI). title: Binance CEO Faces $12 Billion Net Worth Plunge Amid Regulatory Challenges
description: Changpeng Zhao, the co-founder and CEO of Binance, has witnessed a significant decline in his net worth, dropping by a staggering $11.9 billion. This downturn comes as Binance, one of the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchanges, faces plummeting trading volumes and a series of regulatory challenges. title: Gemini sues Genesis for $1.6b GBTC shares ownership
description: Gemini wrote to a federal judge asking the bankruptcy court to invalidate any claims Genesis has to a trove of Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) shares in an ongoing dispute between both the two crypto entities.

title: Taiwan Proposes Draft Crypto Act; Legislation Clears In First Reading
description:
In an update earlier today, Taiwan proposed a draft crypto act for its first reading. According to official documents, the proposal – which is aimed at governing cryptocurrency assets successfully cleared the first reading in the Legislative Yuan, Taiwan’s legislative body. Yung-Chang Chiang, one of the lawmakers in the Legislative Yuan who co-authored the special […]

title: Ledger Crypto Hardware Wallet Launches Subscription-Based Backup Service for Secret Recovery Phrases
description:
One of the biggest crypto hardware wallet providers is rolling out a new service for users who want to have a backup of their secret recovery phrase. The secret recovery phrase is used to restore access to crypto wallets in case the hardware device gets lost or destroyed. Without the recovery phrase, users lose access […]
